verses.verse: וְאִשָּׁ֣ה <WH802> woman אַחַ֣ת <WH259> a certain מִנְּשֵׁ֣י <WH802> of the wives בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the sons הַ֠נְּבִיאִים <WH5030> of the prophets צָעֲקָ֨ה <WH6817> Now there cried אֶל־ <WH413> to אֱלִישָׁ֜ע <WH477> unto Elisha לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> saying עַבְדְּךָ֤ <WH5650> Thy servant אִישִׁי֙ <WH376> my husband מֵ֔ת <WH4191> is dead וְאַתָּ֣ה <WH859> and you יָדַ֔עְתָּ <WH3045> and thou knowest כִּ֣י <WH3588> that עַבְדְּךָ֔ <WH5650> that thy servant הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> become יָרֵ֖א <WH3372> feared אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD וְהַ֨נֹּשֶׁ֔ה <WH5383> and the creditor בָּ֗א <WH935> is come לָקַ֜חַת <WH3947> to take אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁנֵ֧י <WH8147> unto him my two יְלָדַ֛י <WH3206> sons ל֖וֹ לַעֲבָדִֽים׃ <WH5650> to be bondmen

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said אֵלֶ֤יהָ <WH413> about אֱלִישָׁע֙ <WH477> And Elisha מָ֣ה <WH4100> to her What אֶֽעֱשֶׂה־ <WH6213> unto her What shall I do לָּ֔ךְ הַגִּ֣ידִי <WH5046> for thee? tell לִ֔י מַה־ <WH4100> what יֶּשׁ־ <WH3426> me what hast [לְכִי כ] (לָ֖ךְ ק) בַּבָּ֑יִת <WH1004> hath not any thing in the house וַתֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> said אֵ֣ין <WH369> has לְשִׁפְחָתְךָ֥ <WH8198> Thine handmaid כֹל֙ <WH3605> in בַּבַּ֔יִת <WH1004> the house כִּ֖י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> lo אָס֥וּךְ <WH610> save a pot שָֽׁמֶן׃ <WH8081> of oil

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> Then he said לְכִ֨י <WH1980> Go שַׁאֲלִי־ <WH7592> borrow לָ֤ךְ כֵּלִים֙ <WH3627> thee vessels מִן־ <WH4480> at הַח֔וּץ <WH2351> abroad מֵאֵ֖ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all [שִׁכְנָכֵי כ] (שְׁכֵנָ֑יִךְ <WH7934> inhabitant ק) כֵּלִ֥ים <WH3627> vessels רֵקִ֖ים <WH7386> [even] empty אַל־ <WH408> not תַּמְעִֽיטִי׃ <WH4591> borrow not a few

וּבָ֗את <WH935> And when thou art come in וְסָגַ֤רְתְּ <WH5462> thou shalt shut הַדֶּ֙לֶת֙ <WH1817> the door בַּעֲדֵ֣ךְ <WH1157> behind וּבְעַד־ <WH1157> behind בָּנַ֔יִךְ <WH1121> upon thee and upon thy sons וְיָצַ֕קְתְּ <WH3332> and shalt pour out עַ֥ל <WH5921> out כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַכֵּלִ֖ים <WH3627> into all those vessels הָאֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> these וְהַמָּלֵ֖א <WH4392> that which is full תַּסִּֽיעִי׃ <WH5265> and thou shalt set aside

וַתֵּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH1980> went מֵֽאִתּ֔וֹ <WH853> וַתִּסְגֹּ֣ר <WH5462> from him and shut הַדֶּ֔לֶת <WH1817> the door בַּעֲדָ֖הּ <WH1157> upon her and upon וּבְעַ֣ד <WH1157> behind בָּנֶ֑יהָ <WH1121> her sons הֵ֛ם <WH1992> who מַגִּשִׁ֥ים <WH5066> brought אֵלֶ֖יהָ <WH413> about וְהִ֥יא <WH1931> he [מֵיצָקֶת כ] (מֹוצָֽקֶת׃ <WH3332> cast ק)

וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <WH1961> become כִּמְלֹ֣את <WH4390> were full הַכֵּלִ֗ים <WH3627> And it came to pass when the vessels וַתֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> that she said אֶל־ <WH413> to her בְּנָהּ֙ <WH1121> unto her son הַגִּ֨ישָׁה <WH5066> Bring אֵלַ֥י <WH413> about עוֹד֙ <WH5750> another כֶּ֔לִי <WH3627> me yet a vessel וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And he said אֵלֶ֔יהָ <WH413> to her אֵ֥ין <WH369> There ע֖וֹד <WH5750> more כֶּ֑לִי <WH3627> unto her [There is] not a vessel וַֽיַּעֲמֹ֖ד <WH5975> stayed הַשָּֽׁמֶן׃ <WH8081> more And the oil

וַתָּבֹ֗א <WH935> Then she came וַתַּגֵּד֙ <WH5046> and told לְאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> the man הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> of God וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> And he said לְכִי֙ <WH1980> Go מִכְרִ֣י <WH4376> sell אֶת־ <WH853> הַשֶּׁ֔מֶן <WH8081> the oil וְשַׁלְּמִ֖י <WH7999> and pay אֶת־ <WH853> [נִשְׁיֵכִי כ] (נִשְׁיֵ֑ךְ <WH5386> debt ק) וְאַ֣תְּ <WH859> you [בְּנֵיכִי כ] (וּבָנַ֔יִךְ <WH1121> afflicted ק) תִֽחְיִ֖י <WH2421> and live בַּנּוֹתָֽר׃ <WH3498> of the rest פ

וַיְהִ֨י <WH1961> came הַיּ֜וֹם <WH3117> And it fell on a day וַיַּעֲבֹ֧ר <WH5674> passed אֱלִישָׁ֣ע <WH477> that Elisha אֶל־ <WH413> to שׁוּנֵ֗ם <WH7766> to Shunem וְשָׁם֙ <WH8033> where אִשָּׁ֣ה <WH802> woman גְדוֹלָ֔ה <WH1419> where [was] a great וַתַּחֲזֶק־ <WH2388> and she constrained בּ֖וֹ לֶאֱכָל־ <WH398> him to eat לָ֑חֶם <WH3899> bread וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> came מִדֵּ֣י <WH1767> And [so] it was [that] as oft עָבְר֔וֹ <WH5674> as he passed by יָסֻ֥ר <WH5493> he turned שָׁ֖מָּה <WH8033> there לֶאֱכָל־ <WH398> in thither to eat לָֽחֶם׃ <WH3899> bread

וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> And she said אֶל־ <WH413> to her אִישָׁ֔הּ <WH376> unto her husband הִנֵּה־ <WH2009> Behold נָ֣א <WH4994> now יָדַ֔עְתִּי <WH3045> Behold now I perceive כִּ֛י <WH3588> for אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> man אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> of God קָד֣וֹשׁ <WH6918> that this [is] an holy ה֑וּא <WH1931> this עֹבֵ֥ר <WH5674> which passeth עָלֵ֖ינוּ <WH5921> and תָּמִֽיד׃ <WH8548> by us continually

נַֽעֲשֶׂה־ <WH6213> Let us make נָּ֤א <WH4994> Please עֲלִיַּת־ <WH5944> chamber קִיר֙ <WH7023> I pray thee on the wall קְטַנָּ֔ה <WH6996> a little וְנָשִׂ֨ים <WH7760> and let us set ל֥וֹ שָׁ֛ם <WH8033> there מִטָּ֥ה <WH4296> for him there a bed וְשֻׁלְחָ֖ן <WH7979> and a table וְכִסֵּ֣א <WH3678> and a stool וּמְנוֹרָ֑ה <WH4501> and a candlestick וְהָיָ֛ה <WH1961> become בְּבֹא֥וֹ <WH935> and it shall be when he cometh אֵלֵ֖ינוּ <WH413> to us יָס֥וּר <WH5493> to us that he shall turn שָֽׁמָּה׃ <WH8033> there

וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> become הַיּ֖וֹם <WH3117> And it fell on a day וַיָּ֣בֹא <WH935> that he came שָׁ֑מָּה <WH8033> there וַיָּ֥סַר <WH5493> thither and he turned אֶל־ <WH413> to הָעֲלִיָּ֖ה <WH5944> into the chamber וַיִּשְׁכַּב־ <WH7901> and lay שָֽׁמָּה׃ <WH8033> there

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> And he said אֶל־ <WH413> to גֵּחֲזִ֣י <WH1522> to Gehazi נַעֲר֔וֹ <WH5288> his servant קְרָ֖א <WH7121> Call לַשּׁוּנַמִּ֣ית <WH7767> this Shunammite הַזֹּ֑את <WH2063> he וַיִּקְרָא־ <WH7121> And when he had called לָ֔הּ וַֽתַּעֲמֹ֖ד <WH5975> her she stood לְפָנָֽיו׃ <WH6440> before

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And he said ל֗וֹ אֱמָר־ <WH559> unto him Say נָ֣א <WH4994> now אֵלֶיהָ֮ <WH413> to her הִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> Behold חָרַ֣דְתְּ ׀ <WH2729> now unto her Behold thou hast been careful אֵלֵינוּ֮ <WH413> about אֶת־ <WH854> with כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַחֲרָדָ֣ה <WH2731> for us with all this care הַזֹּאת֒ <WH2063> likewise מֶ֚ה <WH4100> what לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <WH6213> what [is] to be done לָ֔ךְ הֲיֵ֤שׁ <WH3426> for thee? wouldest לְדַבֶּר־ <WH1696> thou be spoken לָךְ֙ אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> for to the king א֖וֹ <WH176> or אֶל־ <WH413> to שַׂ֣ר <WH8269> or to the captain הַצָּבָ֑א <WH6635> appointed time וַתֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> Say בְּת֥וֹךְ <WH8432> among עַמִּ֖י <WH5971> mine own people אָנֹכִ֥י <WH595> I יֹשָֽׁבֶת׃ <WH3427> I dwell

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> And he said וּמֶ֖ה <WH4100> What לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <WH6213> What then [is] to be done לָ֑הּ וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> answered גֵּיחֲזִ֗י <WH1522> for her? And Gehazi אֲבָ֛ל <WH61> Verily בֵּ֥ן <WH1121> she hath no child אֵֽין־ <WH369> has לָ֖הּ וְאִישָׁ֥הּ <WH376> and her husband זָקֵֽן׃ <WH2204> is old
וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> And he said קְרָא־ <WH7121> Call לָ֑הּ וַיִּקְרָא־ <WH7121> her And when he had called לָ֔הּ וַֽתַּעֲמֹ֖ד <WH5975> her she stood בַּפָּֽתַח׃ <WH6607> in the door

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> And he said לַמּוֹעֵ֤ד <WH4150> About this season הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> this כָּעֵ֣ת <WH6256> according to the time חַיָּ֔ה <WH2416> of life [אַתִּי כ] (אַ֖תְּ <WH859> you ק) חֹבֶ֣קֶת <WH2263> thou shalt embrace בֵּ֑ן <WH1121> a son וַתֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> And she said אַל־ <WH408> No אֲדֹנִי֙ <WH113> Nay my lord אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> [thou] man הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> of God אַל־ <WH408> No תְּכַזֵּ֖ב <WH3576> do not lie בְּשִׁפְחָתֶֽךָ׃ <WH8198> unto thine handmaid

וַתַּ֥הַר <WH2029> conceived הָאִשָּׁ֖ה <WH802> And the woman וַתֵּ֣לֶד <WH3205> and bare בֵּ֑ן <WH1121> a son לַמּוֹעֵ֤ד <WH4150> at that season הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> he כָּעֵ֣ת <WH6256> unto her according to the time חַיָּ֔ה <WH2416> of life אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> had said אֵלֶ֖יהָ <WH413> as אֱלִישָֽׁע׃ <WH477> that Elisha

וַיִּגְדַּ֖ל <WH1431> was grown הַיָּ֑לֶד <WH3206> And when the child וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> came הַיּ֔וֹם <WH3117> it fell on a day וַיֵּצֵ֥א <WH3318> that he went out אֶל־ <WH413> to אָבִ֖יו <WH1> to his father אֶל־ <WH413> to הַקֹּצְרִֽים׃ <WH7114> to the reapers

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> And he said אֶל־ <WH413> to his אָבִ֖יו <WH1> unto his father רֹאשִׁ֣י ׀ <WH7218> My head רֹאשִׁ֑י <WH7218> my head וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> And he said אֶל־ <WH413> to his הַנַּ֔עַר <WH5288> to a lad שָׂאֵ֖הוּ <WH5375> Carry אֶל־ <WH413> to אִמּֽוֹ׃ <WH517> him to his mother

וַיִּשָּׂאֵ֔הוּ <WH5375> And when he had taken וַיְבִיאֵ֖הוּ <WH935> him and brought אֶל־ <WH413> to אִמּ֑וֹ <WH517> him to his mother וַיֵּ֧שֶׁב <WH3427> he sat עַל־ <WH5921> on בִּרְכֶּ֛יהָ <WH1290> on her knees עַד־ <WH5704> until הַֽצָּהֳרַ֖יִם <WH6672> till noon וַיָּמֹֽת׃ <WH4191> and [then] died

וַתַּ֙עַל֙ <WH5927> And she went up וַתַּשְׁכִּבֵ֔הוּ <WH7901> and laid עַל־ <WH5921> on מִטַּ֖ת <WH4296> him on the bed אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> of the man הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> of God וַתִּסְגֹּ֥ר <WH5462> and shut בַּעֲד֖וֹ <WH1157> behind וַתֵּצֵֽא׃ <WH3318> [the door] upon him and went out

וַתִּקְרָא֮ <WH7121> And she called אֶל־ <WH413> to her אִישָׁהּ֒ <WH376> unto her husband וַתֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> and said שִׁלְחָ֨ה <WH7971> Send נָ֥א <WH4994> Please לִי֙ אֶחָ֣ד <WH259> me I pray thee one מִן־ <WH4480> at הַנְּעָרִ֔ים <WH5288> of the young men וְאַחַ֖ת <WH259> and one הָאֲתֹנ֑וֹת <WH860> of the asses וְאָר֛וּצָה <WH7323> that I may run עַד־ <WH5704> against אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> to the man הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> of God וְאָשֽׁוּבָה׃ <WH7725> and come again

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> And he said מַ֠דּוּעַ <WH4069> Why [אַתִּי כ] (אַ֣תְּ <WH859> you ק) [הֹלַכְתִּי כ] (הֹלֶ֤כֶת <WH1980> along ק) אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> about הַיּ֔וֹם <WH3117> age לֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor חֹ֖דֶשׁ <WH2320> new וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> nor שַׁבָּ֑ת <WH7676> nor sabbath וַתֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> And she said שָׁלֽוֹם׃ <WH7965> [It shall be] well

וַֽתַּחֲבֹשׁ֙ <WH2280> Then she saddled הָֽאָת֔וֹן <WH860> an ass וַתֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> and said אֶֽל־ <WH413> to her נַעֲרָ֖הּ <WH5288> to her servant נְהַ֣ג <WH5090> Drive וָלֵ֑ךְ <WH1980> and go אַל־ <WH408> not תַּעֲצָר־ <WH6113> slack לִ֣י לִרְכֹּ֔ב <WH7392> not [thy] riding כִּ֖י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> lo אָמַ֥רְתִּי <WH559> for me except I bid לָֽךְ׃

וַתֵּ֗לֶךְ <WH1980> went וַתָּב֛וֹא <WH935> and came אֶל־ <WH413> to אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> unto the man הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> of God אֶל־ <WH413> to הַ֣ר <WH2022> to mount הַכַּרְמֶ֑ל <WH3760> Carmel וַ֠יְהִי <WH1961> become כִּרְא֨וֹת <WH7200> saw her afar off אִישׁ־ <WH376> And it came to pass when the man הָאֱלֹהִ֤ים <WH430> of God אֹתָהּ֙ <WH853> מִנֶּ֔גֶד <WH5048> he וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> that he said אֶל־ <WH413> to גֵּיחֲזִ֣י <WH1522> to Gehazi נַעֲר֔וֹ <WH5288> his servant הִנֵּ֖ה <WH2009> Behold הַשּׁוּנַמִּ֥ית <WH7767> Shunammite הַלָּֽז׃ <WH1975> Behold [yonder is] that

עַתָּה֮ <WH6258> now רֽוּץ־ <WH7323> Run נָ֣א <WH4994> Please לִקְרָאתָהּ֒ <WH7125> now I pray thee to meet וֶאֱמָר־ <WH559> her and say לָ֗הּ הֲשָׁל֥וֹם <WH7965> unto her [Is it] well לָ֛ךְ הֲשָׁל֥וֹם <WH7965> with thee? [is it] well לְאִישֵׁ֖ךְ <WH376> is הֲשָׁל֣וֹם <WH7965> [It is] well לַיָּ֑לֶד <WH3206> boy וַתֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> her and say שָׁלֽוֹם׃ <WH7965> well

וַתָּבֹ֞א <WH935> And when she came אֶל־ <WH413> to אִ֤ישׁ <WH376> to the man הָֽאֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> of God אֶל־ <WH413> to הָהָ֔ר <WH2022> to the hill וַֽתַּחֲזֵ֖ק <WH2388> she caught בְּרַגְלָ֑יו <WH7272> him by the feet וַיִּגַּ֨שׁ <WH5066> came near גֵּֽיחֲזִ֜י <WH1522> but Gehazi לְהָדְפָ֗הּ <WH1920> to thrust her away וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <WH559> said אִ֨ישׁ <WH376> And the man הָאֱלֹהִ֤ים <WH430> of God הַרְפֵּֽה־ <WH7503> Let her alone לָהּ֙ כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for נַפְשָׁ֣הּ <WH5315> for her soul מָֽרָה־ <WH4843> [is] vexed לָ֔הּ וַֽיהוָה֙ <WH3069> God הֶעְלִ֣ים <WH5956> hath hid מִמֶּ֔נִּי <WH4480> at וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not הִגִּ֖יד <WH5046> [it] from me and hath not told לִֽי׃

וַתֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> Then she said הֲשָׁאַ֥לְתִּי <WH7592> Did I desire בֵ֖ן <WH1121> a son מֵאֵ֣ת <WH853> אֲדֹנִ֑י <WH113> master הֲלֹ֣א <WH3808> not אָמַ֔רְתִּי <WH559> said לֹ֥א <WH3808> not תַשְׁלֶ֖ה <WH7952> Do not deceive אֹתִֽי׃ <WH853>

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> Then he said לְגֵיחֲזִ֜י <WH1522> to Gehazi חֲגֹ֣ר <WH2296> Gird up מָתְנֶ֗יךָ <WH4975> thy loins וְקַ֨ח <WH3947> and take מִשְׁעַנְתִּ֣י <WH4938> my staff בְיָדְךָ֮ <WH3027> in thine hand וָלֵךְ֒ <WH1980> and go כִּֽי־ <WH3588> if תִמְצָ֥א <WH4672> if thou meet אִישׁ֙ <WH376> any man לֹ֣א <WH3808> not תְבָרְכֶ֔נּוּ <WH1288> salute וְכִֽי־ <WH3588> and if יְבָרֶכְךָ֥ <WH1288> salute אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> him not and if any לֹ֣א <WH3808> not תַעֲנֶנּ֑וּ <WH6030> thee answer him not again וְשַׂמְתָּ֥ <WH7760> and lay מִשְׁעַנְתִּ֖י <WH4938> my staff עַל־ <WH5921> and פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> upon the face הַנָּֽעַר׃ <WH5288> of the child

וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> said אֵ֣ם <WH517> And the mother הַנַּ֔עַר <WH5288> of the child חַי־ <WH2416> liveth יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> [As] the LORD וְחֵֽי־ <WH2416> liveth נַפְשְׁךָ֖ <WH5315> and [as] thy soul אִם־ <WH518> I will not אֶעֶזְבֶ֑ךָּ <WH5800> I will not leave וַיָּ֖קָם <WH6965> thee And he arose וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <WH1980> along אַחֲרֶֽיהָ׃ <WH310> Then

וְגֵחֲזִ֞י <WH1522> And Gehazi עָבַ֣ר <WH5674> passed on לִפְנֵיהֶ֗ם <WH6440> before וַיָּ֤שֶׂם <WH7760> them and laid אֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּשְׁעֶ֙נֶת֙ <WH4938> the staff עַל־ <WH5921> and פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> upon the face הַנַּ֔עַר <WH5288> of the child וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> there ק֖וֹל <WH6963> but [there was] neither voice וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> was no קָ֑שֶׁב <WH7182> nor hearing וַיָּ֤שָׁב <WH7725> Wherefore he went again לִקְרָאתוֹ֙ <WH7125> to meet וַיַּגֶּד־ <WH5046> him and told ל֣וֹ לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> him saying לֹ֥א <WH3808> is not הֵקִ֖יץ <WH6974> is not awaked הַנָּֽעַר׃ <WH5288> The child

וַיָּבֹ֥א <WH935> was come אֱלִישָׁ֖ע <WH477> And when Elisha הַבָּ֑יְתָה <WH1004> into the house וְהִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> behold הַנַּ֙עַר֙ <WH5288> behold the child מֵ֔ת <WH4191> was dead מֻשְׁכָּ֖ב <WH7901> [and] laid עַל־ <WH5921> on מִטָּתֽוֹ׃ <WH4296> upon his bed

וַיָּבֹ֕א <WH935> He went in וַיִּסְגֹּ֥ר <WH5462> therefore and shut הַדֶּ֖לֶת <WH1817> the door בְּעַ֣ד <WH1157> behind שְׁנֵיהֶ֑ם <WH8147> upon them twain וַיִּתְפַּלֵּ֖ל <WH6419> and prayed אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto the LORD

וַיַּ֜עַל <WH5927> And he went up וַיִּשְׁכַּ֣ב <WH7901> and lay עַל־ <WH5921> on הַיֶּ֗לֶד <WH3206> upon the child וַיָּשֶׂם֩ <WH7760> and put פִּ֨יו <WH6310> his mouth עַל־ <WH5921> on פִּ֜יו <WH6310> upon his mouth וְעֵינָ֤יו <WH5869> and his eyes עַל־ <WH5921> on עֵינָיו֙ <WH5869> upon his eyes וְכַפָּ֣יו <WH3709> and his hands עַל־ <WH5921> and [כַּפֹּו כ] (כַּפָּ֔יו <WH3709> and his hands ק) וַיִּגְהַ֖ר <WH1457> and he stretched עָלָ֑יו <WH5921> and וַיָּ֖חָם <WH2552> waxed warm בְּשַׂ֥ר <WH1320> himself upon the child and the flesh הַיָּֽלֶד׃ <WH3206> of the child

וַיָּ֜שָׁב <WH7725> Then he returned וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <WH1980> and walked בַּבַּ֗יִת <WH1004> in the house אַחַ֥ת <WH259> once הֵ֙נָּה֙ <WH2008> back וְאַחַ֣ת <WH259> once הֵ֔נָּה <WH2008> and forth וַיַּ֖עַל <WH5927> and went up וַיִּגְהַ֣ר <WH1457> and stretched עָלָ֑יו <WH5921> and וַיְזוֹרֵ֤ר <WH2237> sneezed הַנַּ֙עַר֙ <WH5288> himself upon him and the child עַד־ <WH5704> against שֶׁ֣בַע <WH7651> seven פְּעָמִ֔ים <WH6471> times וַיִּפְקַ֥ח <WH6491> opened הַנַּ֖עַר <WH5288> and the child אֶת־ <WH853> עֵינָֽיו׃ <WH5869> his eyes

וַיִּקְרָ֣א <WH7121> And he called אֶל־ <WH413> about גֵּיחֲזִ֗י <WH1522> Gehazi וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> and said קְרָא֙ <WH7121> Call אֶל־ <WH413> about הַשֻּׁנַמִּ֣ית <WH7767> this Shunammite הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> he וַיִּקְרָאֶ֖הָ <WH7121> So he called וַתָּב֣וֹא <WH935> her And when she was come in אֵלָ֑יו <WH413> to וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> unto him he said שְׂאִ֥י <WH5375> Take up בְנֵֽךְ׃ <WH1121> thy son

וַתָּבֹא֙ <WH935> Then she went in וַתִּפֹּ֣ל <WH5307> and fell עַל־ <WH5921> at רַגְלָ֔יו <WH7272> at his feet וַתִּשְׁתַּ֖חוּ <WH7812> and bowed אָ֑רְצָה <WH776> herself to the ground וַתִּשָּׂ֥א <WH5375> and took up אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנָ֖הּ <WH1121> her son וַתֵּצֵֽא׃ <WH3318> and went out פ

וֶאֱלִישָׁ֞ע <WH477> And Elisha שָׁ֤ב <WH7725> came again הַגִּלְגָּ֙לָה֙ <WH1537> to Gilgal וְהָרָעָ֣ב <WH7458> and [there was] a dearth בָּאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> in the land וּבְנֵי֙ <WH1121> and the sons הַנְּבִיאִ֔ים <WH5030> of the prophets יֹשְׁבִ֖ים <WH3427> [were] sitting לְפָנָ֑יו <WH6440> before וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> him and he said לְנַעֲר֗וֹ <WH5288> unto his servant שְׁפֹת֙ <WH8239> Set הַסִּ֣יר <WH5518> pot הַגְּדוֹלָ֔ה <WH1419> on the great וּבַשֵּׁ֥ל <WH1310> and seethe נָזִ֖יד <WH5138> pottage לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> for the sons הַנְּבִיאִֽים׃ <WH5030> of the prophets

וַיֵּצֵ֨א <WH3318> went out אֶחָ֣ד <WH259> And one אֶל־ <WH413> into הַשָּׂדֶה֮ <WH7704> into the field לְלַקֵּ֣ט <WH3950> to gather אֹרֹת֒ <WH219> herbs וַיִּמְצָא֙ <WH4672> and found גֶּ֣פֶן <WH1612> vine שָׂדֶ֔ה <WH7704> a wild וַיְלַקֵּ֥ט <WH3950> and gathered מִמֶּ֛נּוּ <WH4480> at פַּקֻּעֹ֥ת <WH6498> gourds שָׂדֶ֖ה <WH7704> thereof wild מְלֹ֣א <WH4393> full בִגְד֑וֹ <WH899> his lap וַיָּבֹ֗א <WH935> and came וַיְפַלַּ֛ח <WH6398> and shred אֶל־ <WH413> into סִ֥יר <WH5518> [them] into the pot הַנָּזִ֖יד <WH5138> of pottage כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for לֹ֥א <WH3808> did not יָדָֽעוּ׃ <WH3045> for they knew

וַיִּֽצְק֥וּ <WH3332> So they poured out לַאֲנָשִׁ֖ים <WH376> O [thou] man לֶאֱכ֑וֹל <WH398> to eat וַ֠יְהִי <WH1961> and as they כְּאָכְלָ֨ם <WH398> And it came to pass as they were eating מֵהַנָּזִ֜יד <WH5138> of the pottage וְהֵ֣מָּה <WH1992> they צָעָ֗קוּ <WH6817> that they cried out וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <WH559> and said מָ֤וֶת <WH4194> [there is] death בַּסִּיר֙ <WH5518> in the pot אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> man הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> of God וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> and they יָכְל֖וּ <WH3201> And they could לֶאֱכֹֽל׃ <WH398> not eat

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> But he said וּקְחוּ־ <WH3947> Then bring קֶ֔מַח <WH7058> meal וַיַּשְׁלֵ֖ךְ <WH7993> And he cast אֶל־ <WH413> into הַסִּ֑יר <WH5518> [it] into the pot וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> and he said צַ֤ק <WH3332> Pour out לָעָם֙ <WH5971> for the people וְיֹאכֵ֔לוּ <WH398> that they may eat וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> no הָיָ֛ה <WH1961> become דָּבָ֥ר <WH1697> act רָ֖ע <WH7451> adversity בַּסִּֽיר׃ <WH5518> in the pot ס

וְאִ֨ישׁ <WH376> a man בָּ֜א <WH935> And there came מִבַּ֣עַל שָׁלִ֗שָׁה <WH1190> from Baalshalisha וַיָּבֵא֩ <WH935> and brought לְאִ֨ישׁ <WH376> the man הָאֱלֹהִ֜ים <WH430> of God לֶ֤חֶם <WH3899> bread בִּכּוּרִים֙ <WH1061> of the firstfruits עֶשְׂרִֽים־ <WH6242> twenty לֶ֣חֶם <WH3899> loaves שְׂעֹרִ֔ים <WH8184> of barley וְכַרְמֶ֖ל <WH3759> and full ears of corn בְּצִקְלֹנ֑וֹ <WH6861> in the husk וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> thereof And he said תֵּ֥ן <WH5414> Give לָעָ֖ם <WH5971> unto the people וְיֹאכֵֽלוּ׃ <WH398> that they may eat

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> said מְשָׁ֣רְת֔וֹ <WH8334> And his servitor מָ֚ה <WH4100> What אֶתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> What should I set זֶ֔ה <WH2088> this לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> this before מֵ֣אָה <WH3967> an hundred אִ֑ישׁ <WH376> he וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> for thus saith תֵּ֤ן <WH5414> Give לָעָם֙ <WH5971> the people וְיֹאכֵ֔לוּ <WH398> that they may eat כִּ֣י <WH3588> for כֹ֥ה <WH3541> thus אָמַ֛ר <WH559> says יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD אָכֹ֥ל <WH398> They shall eat וְהוֹתֵֽר׃ <WH3498> and shall leave

וַיִּתֵּ֧ן <WH5414> So he set לִפְנֵיהֶ֛ם <WH6440> [it] before וַיֹּאכְל֥וּ <WH398> them and they did eat וַיּוֹתִ֖רוּ <WH3498> and left כִּדְבַ֥ר <WH1697> [thereof] according to the word יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD פ
